Text:
this is hard to find ,i decided(after long research) to download a DVDRIP of this one,but you saved my ass there..:D
would have been fantastic if u uploaded 1080p..but then,the only blu ray source i found was 720p by  public hd...so thnx for this up...the only thing is the bitrate is below 1000kbps..

Why anyone would complain about a 720p copy of a nearly impossible movie to find- is beyond me.
Watch it- enjoy it.
Thanks for this up- I, for one, really appreciate it.
